NoleaX Chrome Extension Widget

NoleaX lets you add contacts to your Nolea from anywhere on the web, including LinkedIn, Sales Navigator, Microsoft Teams, Gmail threads, and more.

Forget time-consuming copy-pasting; now you can build your recruiting pipeline with ease using NoleaX. Take the legwork out of collecting contacts for engaging and hiring.

It works like this:

Download the free NoleaX for Chrome extension.
Sign up on Nolea at https://noleahealth.com.
Pin the NoleaX extension to your Chrome browser.
With NoleaX, add new contacts to your Nolea List with just one click from a profile on any website, without needing to open Nolea. It syncs with your Nolea List in real time, and you can also search and edit contacts through the NoleaX extension.
Nolea (https://noleahealth.com/en) is the all-in-one talent search and engagement tool for all your talent management needs.

Questions? Feedback? Feel free to email us at contact@getnolea.com
